data.title: Basketball Löwen Braunschweig X Unyfy
data.meta_description: Unyfy is the web3 fan engagement platform provider of Basketball Loewen Braunschweig. Learn about our partnership in this case study.
data.text:
Our collaboration with Basketball Löwen Braunschweig isn’t just about technology; it’s about transforming the way fans interact with their beloved team. At the heart of our collaboration lies the Löwencrowd – the official Club App, a digital platform that has become the lifeline connecting fans to their favorite team.

Our ongoing partnership with Basketball Löwen Braunschweig and the evolution of the Löwencrowd Club App reflect our dedication to enhancing fan engagement through technology.

The Löwencrowd app has provided the Lions with a channel to connect their fans with their existing sponsors.

They did this by creating a “lion of the game” voting, sponsored by Volkswagen Financial Services. A more unique and engaging way to activate sponsors.

Unyfy enables you to built next-generation digital experiences for your fans. It’s a platform builder tailormade for sports organizations from large to small. It can be used as a standalone solution or integrated into your systems using the platform in a “headless” manner.
